title: Millions celebrate Orthodox Christmas on Jan. 7, following ancient traditions
description: (AP) Millions of people around the world celebrated Orthodox Christmas on Wednesday, nearly two weeks after much of the world marked the holy day.

title: Weekend Worthy: Enjoy free admission to rare display of ancient Roman sculptures
description: The Kimbell Art Museum in Fort Worth is a North American stop for an exhibit featuring 58 Roman marble sculptures from the Torlonia Collection.
